about.title: About
about.meta_description: Meet the founder and the learning science that powers Noosia — spaced repetition, gamification, and adaptive AI.
about.founder_story_p1: I've always believed learning should feel like real progress — not checking boxes or chasing certificates. But when I looked at what was available, I saw a gap: the tools weren't built for how we actually learn.
about.founder_story_p2: So I went to the source. The science of memory, motivation, and habits reveals techniques that genuinely work — spaced repetition, active recall, deliberate practice. Proven, powerful, and barely used by anyone.
about.founder_story_p3: Noosia is what came out of that obsession. A platform that respects your time, adapts to you, and makes skills stick for real. Built for everyone who believes the best investment is in yourself.
about.spaced_repetition_desc: Your knowledge stays for months and years, not days. Noosia reviews material at scientifically optimized intervals — you learn a little, wait, then revisit just before you'd forget. It's the most proven technique in learning science.
about.gamification_desc: Badges, streaks, and progress tracking tap into your natural drive to improve and see results. When learning feels rewarding moment to moment, you show up consistently — and consistency is what turns knowledge into skill.
about.adaptive_desc: Our AI analyzes how you perform and what you already know, then adjusts content in real time. You spend less time on what's easy and more where it matters — like a personal tutor who knows exactly where you are.
